items.name: 11.03 Lord Whitney
items.desc:
13% ABV // 15 EBC // 20 IBU // 1.126 OG // 440ML
INGREDIENTS:  Malted OATS (GLUTEN), Malted BARLEY (GLUTEN), Maize, Dextrose, Orange Zest, Cinnamon, Hops, Yeast
Seeking a mischievous, warming winter beverage, we moved past the more traditional barley base to conjure this oat wine, full of rich, earthy spice and honey from the grain and backed up by barley and maize for notes of biscuit and cornflake. We then conditioned the brew on some traditional flavours of the winter season in the shape of orange zest and cinnamon until the flavour brought a balance to the sweet malt flavours.

items.summary: Laura Slater // Galaxy // Single Hop IPA
items.desc:
7% ABV // 7 EBC // 20 IBU // 1.074 OG // 440ML
INGREDIENTS: Malted BARLEY (GLUTEN), OATS (GLUTEN), Maltodextrin, Hops, Yeast
For the fourth beer in our single hop series with Laura Slater, we return to the southern hemisphere. With this comes a flip in the seasons, the Australian harvest occurs around march, and these fresh hops arrive on UK shores at the end of our summer.
The most heralded of the Australian varieties, Galaxy, is also one of the hardest varieties for a brewer to get hold of, even more frustrating given what a fantastic aroma hop it is. This year we’ve had some success, so leapt at the chance to give it the single-hop treatment.
As you’d expect, we’ve utilised Galaxy at every stage of the hopping process, whirlpooling with 5g/l in a wort packed with the high portions of oats and wheat that’s come to be expected of the NE IPA style. For dry hopping we upped the rate to a heady 25g/l, to really take advantage of the rich oil content that large Galaxy hop cones deliver. The result is an IPA leading with big passion fruit and peach aromas which carry on to the palate, backed up with juicy mango, some citrus, and hints of grass and fern on the finish.

items.name: Daily Mash
items.desc:
5.0% ABV // 8 EBC // 20 IBU // 1.054 OG // 440ML
INGREDIENTS:  Malted BARLEY (GLUTEN), OATS (GLUTEN), WHEAT (GLUTEN), Maltodextrin, Hops, Yeast
This juicy, hazy pale is packed with Amarillo, Citra, Mosaic and Sabro hops that bring big flavours of orange zest, ripe tropical fruits and coconut.

items.name: Dark Side Of The Moob
items.desc:
8.7% ABV // 80 EBC // 25 IBU // 1.089 OG // 440ML
INGREDIENTS:  Malted BARLEY (GLUTEN), OATS (GLUTEN), WHEAT (GLUTEN), Maltodextrin, Dextrose, Hops, Yeast
For this years’ celebration of the humble moob, we've gone to the dark side. The series has always showcased Aussie hops so we’ve led with the punchy combo of Galaxy and Vic Secret and then backed it up with some headline US varieties like Sabro and Mosaic. This is a silky dark brew, lightly roasty with dark chocolate aromas but brimming with tropical flavours and a pithy finish.

items.name: Don't Mess With Yorkshire
items.desc:
8.7% ABV // 14 EBC // 50 IBU // 1.079 OG // 440ML
INGREDIENTS:  Malted BARLEY (GLUTEN), RYE (GLUTEN), WHEAT (GLUTEN), Dextrose, Hops, Yeast
In true northern style, we’ve brewed an old school, no messing, west coast DIPA. Packed with some of the classic US ‘C’ hops plus the headlining Simcoe variety, this is a resinously sticky IPA with punchy notes of citrus pith, melon rind, and dank pine, backed up by smooth caramel notes and a punchy upfront bitterness.

items.name: Drop Project
items.desc:
6.6% ABV // 440ML
Boasting heaps of citrus peel and as much pine as a national park this is DP's homage to one of the all-time greats. Brewed with a complex blend of choice malts and hops - Amarillo, Simcoe, Citra, Azacca and Columbus.

items.name: Enter The Haze
items.desc:
The humble IPA has been on an incredible journey. With it’s origins in England the style quickly took over the world. Initial American attempts to re-create this classic British style with big, bold US hops led the first West Coast IPA’s, over the last decade we’ve seen the style evolve again. Here we combine higher dry hopping with a water profile and yeast that gives stone and tropical fruit flavor and a hazier appearance to the beer. This is one of our favourite styles of beer and we’re proud to have championed it over the years.
Cases contain:
4 x FAITH
4 X STRIDING EDGE
4 X HEATHEN
All for £32!

items.name: Heaven 2020
items.desc:
11% ABV // 100 EBC // 25 IBU // 1.124 OG // 440ML
INGREDIENTS:  Water, Malted BARLEY (GLUTEN), OATS (GLUTEN), RYE (GLUTEN), Maple Syrup, Chocolate, Vanilla, Hops, Yeast
Our annual decadent imperial stout, this robust and silky stout is built over a base of chocolate roast malts and deep, rich crystal malts, fermented with rich maple syrup and dark chocolate before being put away in the freshest, finest US bourbon barrels we could lay our hands on for between 6 and 9 months. Lastly, we removed the beer from the oak and conditioned on Madagascan vanilla before releasing Heaven upon the world.

The Foundation looks to offer £5000 grants to support vital community projects and causes in the North. Every 3 months, we advocate a different social cause.
